TopicTitle: Flying Jeep? You gotta be kidding...

Articles.Content:
Nope, they were not.

[http://www.geek.com/articles/geek-cetera/darpa-pushes-forward-with-military-flying-jeep-program-2010094/](http://www.geek.com/articles/geek-cetera/darpa-pushes-forward-with-military-flying-jeep-program-2010094/)

This could be 'on topic' if we added it to KSP. But it\'s a crazy idea to try and make it real.

I think they are kidding, but are going to get government money anyways.

Man, how awesome would be be to work at Boeing on a project like this. 

'Hey socket! How\'s the flying car going' 

'Pffthctch... Been working hard!'

'...Why do you have a keg of beer'

':-[ Human analog'

'You\'re just getting drunk in that hanger aren\'t you?'

'wanna come?'

' ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png) Yes.'

Could be worse, It could be an inflatable aircraft.

[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goodyear_Inflatoplane](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goodyear_Inflatoplane)

\'not find a 'valid military use for an aircraft that could be brought down by a well-aimed bow and arrow.'\'
Haha, won\'t be long before they are going to deploy soldiers like clone troopers!

> 
> Could be worse, It could be an inflatable aircraft.
> 
> [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goodyear_Inflatoplane](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Goodyear_Inflatoplane)
> 
> \'not find a 'valid military use for an aircraft that could be brought down by a well-aimed bow and arrow.'\'

You sir win an internet... forget that, you win everything for finding that obscure piece of history. No one will ever believe me that it\'s true, you can make an inflatable airplane.

This is the win win situation for ANY problem now. Space ship? Inflatable. Flying car? Inflatable. Moon base? Inflatable.

[http://www.theregister.co.uk/2012/05/11/spacex_bigelow_space_station/](http://www.theregister.co.uk/2012/05/11/spacex_bigelow_space_station/)

> 
> You sir win an internet... forget that, you win everything for finding that obscure piece of history. No one will ever believe me that it\'s true, you can make an inflatable airplane.
> 
> This is the win win situation for ANY problem now. Space ship? Inflatable. Flying car? Inflatable. Moon base? Inflatable.
> 
> [http://www.theregister.co.uk/2012/05/11/spacex_bigelow_space_station/](http://www.theregister.co.uk/2012/05/11/spacex_bigelow_space_station/)

Cause balloons work best.

[http://www.theregister.co.uk/2009/06/16/urban_aero_say_mule_test_imminent/](http://www.theregister.co.uk/2009/06/16/urban_aero_say_mule_test_imminent/)

Militarys around the would seem to want them badly. ^this is one that Israel have been working on for a while now...
They sound like they\'d be easy targets for a sam

They have defiantly been watching too much sci-fi.

I suppose it could be worse, they could have watch too much fantasy, and be asking for giant flying eagles and walking trees.
